name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William STRONG, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William STRONG, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of August, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Whether permitting the jury to deliberate with materials not admitted into evidence violates Pa.R.Crim.P. 646, and if so, is such violation prejudicial per se.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
805 A.2d 1243
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William STRONG, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 28, 2002.
